Package de.lessvoid.nifty

Provides the public classes for Nifty representing the public Nifty API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NiftyCallback<T>
    This is used as a parameter wherever Nifty needs to call user code.
    NiftyCanvasPainter
    Created by void on 27.08.15.
    NiftyNodeCallback<T,N extends NiftyNode>
    This is used as a parameter wherever Nifty needs to call user code.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Nifty
    The main control class of all things Nifty.
    NiftyCanvas
    This can be used to draw.
    NiftyCanvasPainterShader
    The NiftyCanvasPainterShader will use a custom fragment shader.
    NiftyConfiguration
    The NiftyConfiguration class stores all the parameters a user might want to tweak when using Nifty.
    NiftyImage
    A image that can be rendered into a NiftyCanvas or that can be used as a background image for a NiftyNode.
    NiftyLayout
    This is the class that supports the layout nodes to do their work.
    NiftyNodeBuilder
    A fluent API to help building the NiftyNode structure.
    NiftyState
    Created by void on 16.08.15.
    NiftyStatistics
    Several different statistical informations about Niftys internal processing.
    NiftyStatistics.FrameInfo
    A FrameInfo instance records sample times for a specific frame.
    UnitValue
    The UnitValue class stores and manages a value with an optional unit.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NiftyState.NiftyStandardState  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NiftyRuntimeException
    The NiftyRuntimeException will be thrown when Nifty is desperate :)

Package de.lessvoid.nifty Description

Provides the public classes for Nifty representing the public Nifty API. The core Nifty API.
Since:
2.0
